desc: This course provides a capstone to the concentration. Taught as a seminar, it investigates critical and specialized issues in media from multiple and often competing perspectives. Topics change regularly and address a wide range of media-related concerns. Sample topics include Media and the Environment, Media and Religion, Media and Globalization. Prerequisite: Media Studies 160 or permission of instructor. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Top:Media & Globalization
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Media Studies 160 or permission of instructor. Offered annually in the spring semester.
title: Topics in Media
